Package moa.classifiers.core.splitcriteria

Interface SplitCriterion

All Superinterfaces:
Configurable, MOAObject, OptionHandler, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
AMRulesSplitCriterion
All Known Implementing Classes:
GiniSplitCriterion, InfoGainSplitCriterion, InfoGainSplitCriterionMultilabel, SDRSplitCriterion, SDRSplitCriterionAMRules, SDRSplitCriterionAMRulesNode, VarianceRatioSplitCriterion, VarianceReductionSplitCriterion, VRSplitCriterion
public interface SplitCriterion
extends OptionHandler
Interface for computing splitting criteria. with respect to distributions of class values. The split criterion is used as a parameter on decision trees and decision stumps. The two split criteria most used are Information Gain and Gini.
Version:
$Revision: 7 $
Author:
Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz)
